publications: [{"title":"The Merit Pay Dilemma at Nearbuy.com ","subtitle":"Bloomsbury Publishing","date":"Dec 2019","description":"The case got published as a chapter in the book titled \"Ethics and Responsibility in HR, Leadership and Start-up Business\" published by Bloomsbury Publishing. The case was presented in International Conference on Management Cases (ICMC) held at BIMTECH in December 2019. The co-authors are Ms. Arushi, Dr. Ginni Chawla and Dr. Anushree Tandon.Complete Book: https://www.bloomsbury.com/in/ethics-and-responsibility-in-human-resources-leadership-and-start-up-business-9789389449648/"},{"title":"Artificial Intelligence in the Indian Public Sector","subtitle":"Techtonix- Annual Magazine of Systemix - IIFT, Delhi","date":"Aug 2018","description":"Roadmap of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in India | Direct Applications of AI in public sector | Analysis of New India @ 2022 model by NITI Aayog | Sector-specific solutions | Recent AI Developments in India"}]

projects.title: Authorship Attribution using Machine Learning to de-anonymize Quora answers
projects.description: To identify various nuances of the writing style of an author | classification using multi-classifiers and comparing their accuracies | Graphical comparison of two authors | Using the information to de-anonymize answers on Quora.

projects.title: Real time based Women Security (Android & Web) with Mobile Theft Detection tool
projects.description: Features: 1. Emergency and Accident Panic button | 2. Automatic messaging and mailing through the app | 3. Real-time based tracking using Google Maps API and sending notification to people nearby | 4. Police control room, Ambulance services, State women helpline number | 5. Intelligent Mobile theft detection tool

projects.title: Stable Roommate Allocation Software
projects.description: The software calculates stability percentage among all hostellers to generate the best stable roommate pairs based on Artificial Intelligence. It then generates Hostel Room Map based upon optimal match-matching algorithm.

honors_and_awards.title: National Runner-up | Finding NEO (Best Manager) | SP JAIN, Mumbai
honors_and_awards.description: National Runner-up of Finding NEO, the best manager competition hosted by S.P. Jain Institute of Management & Research, Mumbai. Two days of rigorous round-the-clock management events which tested candidates' managerial acumen.

honors_and_awards.title: India Winner | CFA Institute Research Challenge
honors_and_awards.description: The CFA Institute Research Challenge is a global equity research competition which tests the analytic, valuation, report writing, and presentation skills of university students. In this challenge, I worked with a team of five to prepare a comprehensive buy side initiating coverage report on Maruti Suzuki India Ltd and went on to represent India at Asia Pacific round in Sydney, Australia.
